_header: Of one stable was His hall
_description: On the lowliness of Christ — three monorhyming lines

CamTCC323.Transcription:
Of one stable was is halleis kenestol on occe stallesente marie
                    is burnes alle
CamTCC323.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             English Lyrics of the XIIIth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1932: 192.
Woolf,  Rosemary. 
             The English Religious Lyric in the Middle Ages.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1968: 153.
